question: When using AirPrint on the Apeos C7070, which authentication features are not supported?
expected_answer: Authenticated printing and Private Charge Print are not supported by AirPrint

question: What is the warm-up time for the Apeos C5570 when embedded plug-ins are enabled?

What is the maximum power consumption listed for the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the standard system memory and solid-state storage of the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: 4 GB shared memory and 128 GB SSD (shared)

question: On the Apeos C3070, can Digital and Analogue Fax services be used concurrently?
expected_answer: No. Users must choose either digital or analogue Fax; they cannot be used concurrently.

question: What is the maximum standard paper size supported by the bypass tray on the Apeos C2570 before banner mode?
When using Mopria on the Apeos C7070 Series, which connections are not supported?
expected_answer: Bluetooth and cellular (3G/4G) connections are not supported; Wi‑Fi Direct does not support Mopria/AirPrint/Google Cloud Print

question: Which finisher supports the staple-free stapling feature on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: C5 Finisher (staple-free stapling is available only on the C5 Finisher)

question: When a Finisher A2, B4/B5, or C4/C5 with Booklet Maker is installed on the Apeos C7070 Series, which output tray cannot be used?
expected_answer: The centre output tray cannot be used when these finishers are installed

question: How many staples are in a staple cartridge for the C4/C5 Finisher with Booklet on the Apeos C7070 Series?
How many staples are in a staple cartridge for Finisher A2/B4/B5/C4/C5 on the Apeos C7070 Series?

What is the toner cartridge yield for Cyan on the Apeos C7070 Series?

What standard Ethernet interfaces are provided on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What does the Secondary Ethernet Kit enable on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: Connection to two separate Ethernet networks

question: On the Apeos C3070, what happens to duplex speed when printing to the centre output tray with a finisher installed?
expected_answer: Duplex speed is reduced when outputting to the centre tray

question: What file types can be printed directly from a USB memory using the USB Memory Kit on the Apeos C7070 Series?
Are software‑encrypted USB memory devices supported on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: No, USB memory devices encrypted with software are not supported

question: Which additional scan formats does the Advanced Scan Kit enable on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: Searchable (OCR) PDF/DocuWorks and Scan to Word/Excel

question: Which page description languages are standard and optional on the Apeos C7070 Series?
Which operating systems are supported by PCL/PostScript drivers for the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the capacity and maximum size supported by the Exit 2 Tray on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the stacker capacity (without stapling) for A4 on the C5 Finisher of the Apeos C7070 Series?
If remote access is unavailable, how must the Scan Delivery Kit for the Apeos C4570 be configured?
expected_answer: On‑site by an analyst at standard service rates

question: When using AirPrint on the Apeos C7070, what is the behavior of hole punch positioning?
expected_answer: The hole punch position is fixed under AirPrint

question: What caution does the CED give about using non‑FBAU coated paper on the Apeos C4570?
expected_answer: It may cause misfeeds, skewing, and image streaks; use of such media is not guaranteed

question: What paper weight range is supported for stapling on the C5 Finisher of the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: 52–256 gsm for stapled jobs; 64–105 gsm for staple‑free

question: What is the general paper weight range supported by standard trays on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the maximum paper size supported by Tray 2 on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the maximum and minimum original paper size supported for copying on the Apeos C5570?
What accessory is required to interface the Apeos C7070 Series with external cost-recovery devices?
On the Apeos C7070 Series, can the internal Auditron and an external EPSV device be used at the same time?
expected_answer: No. Either the internal Auditron or an external device via EPSV may be used, not both concurrently

question: Which cloud services are supported for print/scan on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: Print and Scan for Google (Cloud Service Hub)

question: What type of document feeder is provided on the Apeos C7070 Series?
Does the Apeos C7070 Series provide Gigabit Ethernet?
Which combination is unsupported on the Apeos C7070 Series: Exit 2 Tray with which finishers?
expected_answer: Exit 2 Tray cannot be used with Finisher B5; not installed with Finisher A2; incompatible when C5 Finisher with Booklet Maker (2/3 or 2/4‑hole options) is attached

question: Which USB interface version is provided on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the part code for the Adobe PostScript 3 Kit on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the part code for the Secondary Ethernet Kit on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the part code for the USB Memory Kit on the Apeos C7070 Series?
How many PCL fonts and symbol sets are provided on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the halftone colour depth of the scanner on the Apeos C7070 Series?
What is the capacity of the bypass tray (Tray 5) on the Apeos C2570?
What is the standard capacity of Tray 1 on the Apeos C3070?
Which imperial banner size is referenced for the Apeos C7070 Series?
What would likely happen if the Apeos C7070 operates continuously above its maximum monthly volume of 50,000 prints?
expected_answer: Continuous operation beyond the maximum AMPV may cause accelerated wear and reliability issues; FUJIFILM recommends using a higher-capacity device.

question: How would high humidity levels above 85 percent affect print quality on the Apeos C5570?
expected_answer: Excess humidity can cause paper deformation and poor toner adhesion, leading to image defects or paper jams.

question: If a customer regularly prints coated stock on the Apeos C4570, what performance issues might occur?
expected_answer: Non-FBAU coated media can cause misfeeds, skewing, and image streaks due to different paper surface properties.

question: Why does FUJIFILM recommend a dedicated analogue fax line for the Apeos C3070?
expected_answer: Dedicated analogue lines prevent interference from ADSL or EFTPOS systems and ensure compliance with PSTN fax standards.

question: What factors could reduce booklet-folding accuracy when using the C5 Finisher on the Apeos C7070 Series?
expected_answer: Folding precision depends on sheet count and paper thickness; heavier or coated stock increases skew.
notes: C4/C5 Finisher with Booklet Maker Limitations

question: Why might AirPrint output a colour document even when black-and-white is selected on macOS for the Apeos C7070?
expected_answer: macOS AirPrint may ignore grayscale settings; FUJIFILM recommends its proprietary print driver for accurate colour control.

question: If duplex printing jams frequently on the Apeos C3070, which configuration should a technician verify first?
expected_answer: Check that the output destination is the Finisher tray; duplex reliability decreases when outputting to the centre tray.

question: Why can’t the Wireless Network Kit 2 on the Apeos C5570 connect in ad-hoc Wi-Fi mode?
expected_answer: The kit supports only infrastructure and Wi‑Fi Direct modes; IEEE 802.11b and ad-hoc connections are unsupported.

question: If the Scan Delivery Kit for the Apeos C4570 cannot be configured remotely, what must FUJIFILM arrange?
expected_answer: On-site configuration by an analyst at standard service rates, since remote access is unavailable.

question: How could operating the Apeos C6570 in a non-air-conditioned environment impact long-term maintenance?
expected_answer: Heat and humidity accelerate toner contamination, increase misfeeds, and degrade image quality, requiring more frequent service.
